cmd.name: German chamber
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to gain experience by learning from more experienced allies

cmd.name: Wolf Summoning
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to sacrifice themselves and summon a wolf that remains under your control for about 200 seconds
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Wolf Summoning, default

cmd.name: Deer Summoning
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to sacrifice themselves and summon a deer that remains under your control for about 3 minutes
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Deer Summoning, default

cmd.name: German Mass Heal
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to sacrifice themselves to distribute up to 1000 health among nearby allies.\nThe same effect also applies every time that an enchantress dies
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Mass Heal, default
